p: In this paper, it is proposed for the first time the Zoopharmacology (comprising Zoopharmacognosy and Zootherapy) as an encouraging way to find new cancer treatments in the context of helping to overcome MDR inhibiting drug transporters and/or by new drugs that hypersensitize resistant cancer cells through collateral sensitivity ( Figure 2). Different concepts related to these areas are going to be explained following by a critical discussion of this topic.
